alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Cotton; Greer; Harmon; Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 01 at 3:06PM CDT until August 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR BREEZY WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND HOT TEMPERATURES FOR SOUTHWESTERN OKLAHOMA AND WESTERN NORTH TEXAS... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND HOT TEMPERATURES FOR WESTERN NORTH TEXAS AND SOUTHWEST OKLAHOMA... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds, low humidity, and hot temperatures, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM CDT Wednesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * TIMING...12 pm to 9 pm. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * TEMPERATURES...105 to 108 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
